view.results

Class Graph

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • view.results.Graph
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable

    public class Graph
extends javax.swing.JComponent
    Creates the GUI tab for the Graph.
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Doug Sweeney
